import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; import "./Home.css" import Navbar from "./Navbar/Navbar"; import Footer from "./footer/Footer"; import pdfToText from 'react-pdftotext' import axios from "axios"; export const Home = () => { const email = "email" const [file,setFile]=useState("") const [fileContent, setFileContent] = useState(""); // State to store the content of the file const [fileText,sestFileText]=useState("") // Function to handle file change const [que,setQue]=useState("") const [queArr,setQueArr] = useState([ "Who are you?", "Who are you?", "Who are you?", "Who are you?", ]) const [ansArr,setAnsArr]=useState([ "Let me know!", "Let me know!", "Let me know!", "Let me know!", "Let me know!", "Let me know!", "Let me know!", "Let me know!", "Let me know!", "Let me know!", "Let me know!", ]) const handleQuestions = (text) => { setQueArr((prev)=>[...prev,text]) setQue("") } return (
{ queArr.map((item, idx) => { return ( ansArr[idx] &&
{item} {ansArr[idx]}
) }) }
{ setQue(e.target.value) }}> handleQuestions(que)}>
) }
